About
WELCOME TO
the SNOOK INN!
Marco Islandâ€™s famous landmark, the Snook Inn is the perfect place to experience authentic island cuisine for lunch and dinner. Join us for live music every evening and during the day Thursday thru Sunday and even catch a beautiful Marco Island Sunset. We have waterside dining both inside and outside so you never have to worry about the heat or the rain here at the Snook. Serving the Marco community for over 30 years, give us a chance to make an ordinary day extraordinary, your special occasion extra special or if you are looking for that local hangout, give us a try â€“ Let us make a believer out of you today!
a menu full of
fresh catches
The Snook Inn serves a variety of land and sea favorites. Check out our menu to find your next favorite dish!
